title: Motorbranschens Riksförbund
desc: Development of a new web-based system for car service workshops and billing insurance companies. The challenges of this project include supporting all legal requirements of GDPR, bookkeeping law and building a system with the end user in focus.

title: Energiföretagen
desc: Complete rebuild of Energiföretagens publications website, EBR-e, on top of their existing EPiServer.

title: Playpilot
desc: Created the foundation for a notification platform in AWS Lambda.

title: Vimla
desc: Vimla is Telenors fighter brand. I was moving around between roles where needed.

title: Arbetsförmedlingen
desc: A service that made it easier for people who are new in Sweden to establish themselves on the Swedish job market.

title: Läkare utan gränser (MSF)
desc: Digitalization of the recruitment process. Before there was a lot of paperwork and manual labor, but we helped MSF by building a web app that the recruiters could use on a tablet. These applications were then automatically processed through the system.

title: Taxi Stockholm
desc: Building microservices as backend for their new mobile apps.

title: Besedo
desc: Auditing system for ads on services like Blocket.

title: Powerfx
desc: Created a UI for a online music studio in chrome.

title: TRR Trygghetsrådet
desc: Built a webapp for music streaming with all the basic features of a music streaming service we know today, but also with the ability to add your voice and stream to each other to make it more like your own radio station.

title: Beckers
desc: Rebuilding the user-facing websites for customer and companies
